reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and appreciate its thick, stretchy fabric that feels soft and comfortable. Moreover, they like the fit, with one customer noting the subtle flare at the bottom, and another mentioning good coverage around the armholes. However, opinions about sizing are mixed, with several customers noting it runs extremely small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress!
items.body: Great dress! The fabric is nice and stretchy. The dress is super comfortable and looks amazing. I am 5'7, 140lbs and I purchased Small size. Super happy and I totally recommend. I originally bought the white one, super happy that is not see through and I am ordering the blue one. Read more
items.author: Nataliebfit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wedding guest dress
items.body: I ended up wearing this dress to an Oct wedding in Nashville and it was perfect. It’s form fitting but rhe bottom has a subtle flare which is very elegants. And the material is thick and stretchy. I think it can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super dress for any occasion.
items.body: I received so many compliments on this dress! It’s very comfortable and fits perfect. Hugs your body nicely, but not too tight. For reference, I’m 5’5” and 130 lbs and bought the small. If I’d lose the 10 pounds I need to, it would truly be a perfect fit. The length was great with heels. I may buy another in a different color. Amazon suggested xs as my size, but after reading reviews I felt that would be too tight, and I would have been right. Read more
items.author: Lyn Harper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material and how well it was done
items.body: Beautiful dress, good material and well made, but you need to size up, I had to return it for a large and I’m a size medium I love the black with white dots, I ordered 3 in different colors Read more
items.author: Bee B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Bridal Shower Theme!
items.body: MY wife attended a bridal shower with a white and polka dot theme, and this dress was absolutely perfect for the occasion. It fit her like a glove, and the size was spot on. She received so many compliments on it and found it incredibly comfortable to wear. The dress is made of high-quality material, and she is already planning to wear it for other events in the future. The fabric is quite thick, so it looks like it will last a long time. All in all, it was a great find, and we couldn't be happier with the purchase! Read more
items.author: A&P

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits tight and feels cheap
items.body: Cute style, but feels a bit like a plastic swimsuit, very synthetic feeling. Definitely want to size up. It is more form fitting than it shows, and hugs body tight. I don’t like the fabric feel, so I will be returning it. Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this now!
items.body: So flattering - buy this dress! I get compliments every time I wear it. So comfy, no zipper, fits true to size. Great stretch and quality of fabric Read more
items.author: Jamie Mager

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Low quality sewing
items.body: Too baggy at the hip area, there is too much extra fabric making it very unflattering Read more
items.author: K

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Brown, Blue, Black and White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
